response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe holds immense value for you, estimated at $1,200,000. After careful consideration and analysis of its unique features and benefits, I am offering this exceptional item to you at an exclusive price of $1,100,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a product that not only meets but exceeds your expectations.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am here to answer any questions or provide further details to ensure you make an informed decision.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
